I tested this - doesn't work. Can't seem to get the wheels to align with the travel direction. If I mount the wheel wells sideways, the wheels also point sideways.

Im away from my computer for a while, but cant you tweak the part so that the tyre is at 90 degrees to the alignment of the wheel well?

I noticed that the (normal, untweaked) small version (single wheel) rotates on retraction so that the tyre is in the same plane as the fuselage surface (stored flat), if you can get the (extended) wheel to 90degrees then it should simulate the sort of gear you are looking for. Unless the tweakables are set up in a way which does not allow this, next time Im in KSP I'll try and remember to have a play.
